value.name: Bull riding, Whac-a-Mole, prisoner release: News from around our 50 states
value.description: Beshear said in a news release that Kentucky has confirmed more than 19,100 cases of the virus and at least 622 fatalities. “We have another day of really high numbers of COVID-19 cases,” Beshear said.

value.name: Drop in Virginia jail's expenses creates way to pay tuition
value.description: “The regional jail expense decreased by $275,000 due to the COVID-19 shutdown of the court system,” said County Administrator Eric Young. That money will be used to fulfill a pledge to county ...

value.name: Dream's Renee Montgomery to skip WNBA season to focus on 'social justice reform'
value.description: Atlanta Dream point guard Renee Montgomery announced on Twitter that she will not be joining the team for the 2020 WNBA season, as she will be focusing on 'social justice reform' instead.

value.name: Masking up: Protective coverings not just for MLB dugouts
value.description: At 68, Washington has seen fellow Braves coach Eric Young Sr. and Mets hitting coach Chili Davis opt out this season. “I know I’m one of the high-risk guys,” he said. “I trust the protocol ...

value.name: Braves’ Acuña has even bigger role in shortened 2020 season
value.description: Washington, 68, is at high risk for the virus. He remained with the team even after first-base coach Eric Young Sr. opted out. To help his health, Washington said he stopped smoking on March 13 ...

value.name: Braves star Freeman, 3 others test positive for virus
value.description: Snitker also said first base coach Eric Young Sr., 53, has opted out of for the season due to concerns about the COVID-19 pandemic. The Braves began their summer workouts at Truist Park on Friday ...

value.name: Braves 'ultimate pro' OF Nick Markakis opts out of season
value.description: Braves first base coach Eric Young Sr. also will sit out the season. Snitker said he respected the decision by Markakis, who he said is “an ultimate pro.” Snitker said losing the respected ...
